data.title: Pierce County Elections releases initial Primary results
meta_keywords: Pierce County Elections releases initial Primary results
data.text:
PIERCE COUNTY 8/6/2024Â â First results of the 2024 Primary Election are in, with polls having closed at 8 p.m. Pierce County Elections reports 114,049 total ballots counted with an estimated 20,000 ballots left to count. Updated results will be posted tomorrow, Aug. 7, at 4:30 p.m. at results.vote.wa.gov/results/20240806/pierce.
